name: Robin hood love-engine
description:
Robin hood mod of the Hunchback love game (based on quasimofo source by krunkathos and team).
I was planning to add new levels in the future and more enemies to include a shooting capacity for robin.
If you get chance have a list to this audiobook on the legend
https://librivox.org/the-merry-adventures-of-robin-hood-by-howard-pyle
